companies.name: QBuddy
companies.descript: QBuddy is a platform which forms meaningful friendships by introducing people together and hosting virtual events.

companies.name: YayNay
companies.descript: YayNay revolutionizes constituent engagement, allowing congressional offices to poll and message voters quickly and effectively.

companies.name: currant.ai
companies.descript: We develop mobile applications that utilize artificial intelligence and edge computing to provide driving assistance to drivers, generate driving behavior analytics, evaluate driving safety scores, and provide assessments to insurance companies.

companies.name: Veggie Cup
companies.descript: Veggie Cup is a start-up based in Ithaca, NY with the goal of providing college students and busy professionals with a tasty, healthy, and vegetable rich instant meal option.

companies.name: Invictus BCI
companies.descript: Our mission is to create an affordable neuroprosthetic that can restore near natural functionality.

companies.name: takk
companies.descript: takk is a modern, data-driven software solution that helps schools maximize gifts from alumni, parents, fan bases, and friends.
